name: Poke Abby
storyline: You notice one of the students sneaking down to the potions class while everyone else is in the great hall. As a ghost of Autumnhearth, it is your duty to make sure the students aren't getting themselves into trouble! Clearly the responsible thing to do is to wait for her in the potions classroom and catch her by surprise!
summary: Poke Abby is a 3D interactive sex game taking place at the Autumnhearth College for Magically Gifted Beings.
